item.description:
Hey Canucks,

Sorry for the location change and extra (final) email.

Due to the number of RSVPs, I am switching the location of Sunday's USA v Canada to the Greatest Bar, near TD Garden. Champions had a hard time accommodating us, needed a deposit, and required us to purchase a fair amount of food and drink, and it's more expensive there. So I shopped around, and the Greatest Bar with their 14 foot HD tv have no stipulations. Just show up eat, drink what you want and cheer on the red and white!

So, 7pm, for food, drink, and good hockey. Make sure you update your RSVP so I have a general idea of the numbers the bar is to expect.

If you are taking the T like me, take the green line inbound to North Station.



Hope to see you there!

Go! Canada Go!

Bruce

p.s. Wear something identifiable as Canadian if you can. Doesn't have to be red/white with the flag on it, anything at all. University shirt, t-shirt of a region, city etc etc.

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Canada vs USA at The Greatest Bar
